attributes.action: THE TV SHOULD DISPLAY A HEALTH WARNING
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is concern is some scientific and medical circles regarding television viewing and its affects on health. There is also concern regarding the impact the television is having on public behaviour.

The area of most concern is the effect television viewing may be having on young children and their learning abilities. 

Adults too could be in danger if they have watched television since childhood they could risk serious illnesses. 

This is a call for the television screen to display a health warning.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
